content:
cds-hooks-bot opened Issue #298

## May 2018 Ballot Comment 92

Submitted by Kanwarpreet Sethi on behalf of KP Sethi from Lantana Consulting Group

Chapter: Hook context and prefetch
Section:
Type: A-S :bulb:
In Person Requested? No

Comment:
Hook context and prefetch discussion is somewhat confusing, and the examples aren't very helpful since they repeat a lot of the same information.
I would suggest using a simple running example and showing the context, the prefetch, including what their definitions look like so its easier to understand what they look like.

_This issue was imported by @cds-hooks-bot from the consolidated CDS Hooks May 2018 ballot spreadsheet._

cds-hooks-bot commented on Issue #298

Proposed Disposition: Persuasive with Mod
Proposed Disposition Comment:
We will clarify prefetch and context

cds-hooks-bot commented on Issue #298

## :telephone_receiver: CDS Working Group Block Vote (5-30-2018)

Meeting notes: http://wiki.hl7.org/index.php?title=File:2018-05-30_CDS_WG_Call_Minutes.docx

Julia Skapik moved the following disposition, seconded by @brynrhodes.

Disposition: Persuasive with Mod
Disposition Comment:
We will clarify prefetch and context

:+1: For: 12
:expressionless: Abstain: 0
:-1: Against: 0

:tada: The motion passed! :tada:
